title: I dream of insects and cockroaches by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming of insects and cockroaches is one of the annoying visions that disturb us. There is no doubt that everyone never wants to see insects and cockroaches in their home or in front of their eyes. We find that seeing them leads to envy, evil eye, and jealousy around the dreamer, and from here we find that killing them is a promising vision and an indication of good things, and not only that. On the contrary, the meanings of the dream are multiple, as the majority of jurists explained to us throughout the article. Dreaming of insects and cockroaches. Interpreters believe that dreaming of insects and cockroaches shows the extent of the dreamer’s suffering in his life due to the large number of enemies and his inability to detect them due to their treachery and hypocrisy. By killing insects and cockroaches, it represents victory over enemies and protecting them from their harm. We find that the attack of insects and cockroaches leads to the presence of enemies and their continuous attempts to prevent the dreamer from achieving his goals. Dream about insects and cockroaches by Ibn Sirin. We find that Ibn Sirin’s dream about insects and cockroaches is a clear indication of the huge amount of bad gossip about the dreamer. , which makes him psychologically damaged because everyone looks at him with hatred and malice, and the dream leads to many enemies. Especially if cockroaches are coming out from everywhere and the dreamer is trying hard to escape from them. Seeing black cockroaches is a sign of envy and hatred, so it is necessary for the dreamer to warn all his relatives and friends so that his Lord will save him from the evil of the black souls that surround him and keep him away from any harm or distress. By killing cockroaches, we find that the vision takes another path, which is getting rid of enemies and living in peace regardless of difficulties, just as killing insects shows the inability of others to harm the dreamer no matter how hard they try. Seeing cockroaches in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiOur translator Fahd Al-Osaimi believes that seeing cockroaches in a dream is a sign of enemies. There are many things around him and there are many losses and damages that prevail in the dreamer’s life. Whatever the vision, it will make it difficult for him to achieve his goals because of the large number of demonstrators and enemies around him. If the cockroaches are black and the dreamer is married, this will lead to his suffering with his wife and his falling into many problems due to inequality with his wife and his inability to overcome his marital problems peacefully. You dream of insects and cockroaches Alone. The majority of our jurists explain that a dream about insects and cockroaches for an unmarried woman is not considered good, as the dream indicates that she is being bewitched by someone around her. Young, this expresses her approaching joy in her upcoming engagement or marriage and her happiness in the coming days. The vision is a warning of the need to be careful with relatives and friends, as it is necessary not to get close so that the dreamer is not harmed, and she must keep her secrets and not reveal them in front of others. There is no problem occurring. What is the interpretation of seeing cockroaches being killed in a dream for a single woman? Seeing cockroaches being killed in a dream for an unmarried woman is good news and evidence of the dreamer’s ability to overcome all his worries and personal problems. Soon to work. What does a brown cockroach mean in a single woman’s dream? Seeing a brown cockroach in a dream for an unmarried woman means that she is close to the anguish and distress of her enemies.

title: Interpretation of Saudi Arabia in a dream and traveling to the Kingdom in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a trip to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in a dream by plane, sea, ship or land, by car or bus, the Kingdom of Saudi ArabiaTranslation of travel in the Kingdom of Saudi ArabiaWe often see in our dreams as if we are traveling in the Kingdom of Saudi ArabiaThese dreams are often the result of a strong desire and desire, because in the Kingdom of Arabia Saudi Arabia, God created the Holy Kaaba in Mecca as well as the Prophet’s Mosque in Medina, and millions of people go there to perform Hajj or Umrah rituals every year.So prepare yourself. Dreaming of traveling to Saudi Arabia is an indication of goodness and blessings in the life of God or good news of livelihood and luck. Perhaps it is news to the believer that he will soon perform the rituals of Hajj or Umrah, God willing. The green color is for knowledge and also testimony that there is no god but God and that Muhammad is the Messenger of God, and it is an expression of the monotheism referred to by knowledge. As these previous signs indicate glory in this world, blessings, goodness, and wealth. , and an abundance of food, which makes him a friend in his life, security, and stability in his life and affairs in general, and perhaps that. It is a sign of success and prosperity. Traveling to Saudi Arabia in one dream. As for the vision of a single girl or single woman traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in a dream, and this vision was not in the time of Hajj, then this is good news, victory and success, or obtaining a job or position that one desires, or Success in something one desires greatly, or it may be an omen. Or perhaps the good news is that he will obtain money, sustenance, or a lot of goods, and it also indicates security and safety from fears. The best vision in a single girl’s dream is if she sees herself veiled and unadorned and sees her wandering in the markets of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the markets of Riyadh, for example, then this indicates On gain, wealth and livelihood, and seeing single women as if they were never praying the Holy Kaaba in the Great Mosque or in prayer in the Prophet’s Mosque. This heralds marriage if she is of an age that allows it, and is generally an indication of happy news. Traveling to Saudi Arabia in a married woman’s dream. In general, if the married woman is already looking forward to traveling to the Kingdom Saudi Arabia for the purposes of work or immigration and she saw in her dream that she traveled to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and set foot on its land, then this is good news. That her dream and desire to travel will come true. I hope that her dearest wish will come true and that she will have news of an imminent pregnancy if she so desires. And for married women meeting the Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques, it portends glory, prestige, power, living, obtaining money or giving birth to a child, especially if the married woman sees that the King of Saudi Arabia has given her a gold ring. Seeing a married woman As if she were marrying a Saudi woman in the dream, this indicates good luck and good and happy news that will happen to her soon. Traveling to Saudi Arabia in a pregnant dream As for the vision of a pregnant woman traveling in Saudi Arabia, in her dream, if she sees that she is traveling to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia to perform the Hajj rituals, it is good that she will give birth

title: Interpretation of dates in a dream of any kind by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dates in a dream: It carries. Interpretation of dates in a dream. Meanings and connotations differ for the dreamer, as the interpretation of the vision differs, whether male or female, and according to time and place. Interpretation of dates in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin’s action. Interpretation of dates in a dream in his famous writing. Interpretation of dreams and their interpretation of different signs that we will know through the site. Different as the following. Whoever sees A date in a dream, it is good for the dreamer to gain money that does not last long. If one sees that he is hitting a date tree, this is a sign that he will soon obtain a high position or travel. Whoever sees red dates in his dream, it indicates food and goodness that the dreamer will receive, And his condition is good and comfortable. If he sees yellow dates in a dream, this indicates a change in the dreamer’s life for the better. Whoever sees dates in a dream, this is evidence of improving health and getting rid of the problems and worries that the dreamer suffers from. And whoever dreams of picking dates from palm trees, this is evidence that God He gives him a male son. Seeing date paste indicates the wealth that the dreamer possesses. Whoever sees that he is eating dates, this means profits and money that will come to him through the work of a special project. Possible interpretation of dates in a dream is as rain falls. Seeing buried dates indicates saving money and benefiting from it. If One sees that he is taking dates from another person, then this is an indication of the abundance of food. Interpretation of dates in a dream according to Nabul. Nabul will do. Interpretation of dates in a dream is evidence of legitimate money that the fortuneteller will gain from work or trade. Seeing yourself eating dates means that you will earn halal money. Dates may indicate Getting rid of stress and alleviating the anxiety that the dreamer suffers from. Whoever sees dates on the tree means happiness and relief from stress and anxiety. Whoever sees unclean red dates in a dream, this is a sign of diseases affecting the dreamer. Whoever sees that he is eating dates, this is evidence of the great wealth that the dreamer possesses. Interpretation of dates in a dream for a single woman. If a single woman sees a date in a dream, this is a sign of positive events that will occur in her life. This vision also indicates that she will be liberated from the hardship of her livelihood and will acquire great wealth and will be wise and have an influential personality. If she sees in her dream that she is distributing dates In a dream, this is evidence that she will get married soon. If she dreams that she is buying dates, this indicates that she will have a happy marriage with the one she loves. The girl must be fair, just, reliable, and courageous when she sees this dream. If she sees yellow dates in a dream, this is a sign of The beauty and kindness of her future husband. Interpretation of dates in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating red dates, this is a sign of the happy life that she will live in the coming period. If she sees that you are buying dates from the market in a dream, this is evidence of the money and livelihood that she will gain. And her husband soon. If she saw that she was cutting dates in a dream, this indicates that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a child. If she saw that she stole a date in her dream, this indicates problems that

title: Interpretation of seeing a cafe in a dream for an unmarried woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cafe in a dream for single and married women, a cafe is a place where people spend some of their free time and enjoy drinking hot or cold drinks. In the internal and psychological balance and the desire to escape, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a cafe in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a cafe in a dream for men If the dream is comfortable and quiet, and the cafe is spacious and elegant, this indicates the dreamer's family and social comfort. If he is sitting happily and smiling in the cafe, this indicates that his worries will soon go away. If the cafe is crowded, cramped and smells bad? This indicates anxiety and upcoming spiteful problems. If the cafe has loud noise, fights and noise, this indicates a psychological imbalance and the dreamer is going through. If there are games, cards or dice, or if there is smoking in the cafe, this indicates hatred and bad news. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cafe in a dream for a single woman Coffee means a positive change if the girl is single and this change can be emotional. If an unmarried woman sits in a cafe while working or busy, this indicates a noticeable development in her work in the coming period. If a single woman sits with a stranger in a cafe, this may indicate that a partner will enter her life in the near future. If singles drink anything in the cafe, this indicates an imminent and expected achievement. If you drink milk, this indicates grace and prosperity. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cafe for a married woman If the cafe is quiet and comfortable, this indicates a happy family atmosphere. And the married woman sitting in the cafe is smiling and happy, evidence of her coming from comfort and anxiety. If a married woman sits with her husband in the cafe, this indicates There is a good and calm relationship between them. If a married woman sits with a stranger in a cafe, this indicates the upcoming change in her life, which may be in family aspects, travel, or getting a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cafe in a dream for a pregnant woman A pregnant woman seeing herself sitting in a cafe and enjoying herself is evidence of an easy birth and the safety of the newborn. If the cafe is empty, this indicates the approach of the hospital. If the waiter comes quickly in a dream to take orders, this indicates the approaching date of birth and the ease of childbirth. The appearance of coffee in a dream indicates achieving a state of stability, comfort and reassurance after a period of fatigue and internal noise. Seeing coffee in dreams is repeated for people in transitional changes in their lives and in periods of choosing important decisions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about hitting an enemy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hitting an enemy in a dream and seeing being beaten can express different meanings. Interpretation of a dream about hitting an enemy in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about hitting an enemy in a dream can express keeping up with things and getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees that the enemy is hitting the enemy in a dream, it may mean This is because she gets rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see a divorced woman, hitting the enemy in his eyes may mean that you are thinking about religious matters and that God has all knowledge. If the dreamer sees himself hitting the enemy in a dream, this may be evidence that he is getting rid of problems. God is Greatest and Most Knowing. The interpretation of a dream about a boy smiling at me in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a boy smiling at me in a dream could indicate getting rid of problems, and God knows best. If a married woman sees a boy smiling at her, she will get rid of sadness, and God knows best. When a divorced woman sees a boy smiling at her in a dream, perhaps this means that she will get rid of problems. And God Almighty knows best. Seeing a married woman and a boy smiling at her in a dream can mean happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about an enemy being sad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an enemy being sad in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing a sad person in a dream can be a sign of the need for support. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a sad person in a dream, this could be evidence that he has gone through some problems that he is suffering from, and God knows the unseen. As it may indicate his need for the dreamer’s help, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about turning an enemy into a friend in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about turning an enemy To a friend in a dream, seeing an enemy shaking hands may represent the collapse of disputes and reconciliation. If the dreamer sees your enemy turning into a friend in a dream, he can express peace with the enemy, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When you see an enemy shaking hands in a dream, it may be a sign that problems with him will end, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the enemy turning into a friend in a dream, this could be a sign of love and friendship, and God knows the unseen.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the enemy silent in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of seeing the enemy silent in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a silent person in a dream could be a sign of a problem, and God knows best. Likewise, if a married man sees a silent person in a dream, this may be evidence of the crises he faces, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see A married woman sees a silent person in a dream, as this may be a sign of contentment, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the enemy being expressed in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the enemy in a dream can lead to hatred and hatred. Seeing the joy of the enemy in a dream can express hatred, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see gloating in A dream could be a sign of misguidance and ignorance, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is a witch, she may express ignorance and hatred, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of leaving the enemy’s house in a dream. title: Interpretation of dreams that my husband is having sex with me according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that my husband had sex with her breadwinner. There are many interpretations, especially since this intimate relationship between husband and wife was allowed by God above the seven heavens and gave her the best reward, which made a visual search difficult to know what this dream brings her. Of gestures, and in this article we will present their interpretation by leading jurists. I dreamed that my husband had sex with me. A dream that my husband has sex with me has many interpretations, some of which are a curse and some of which are a blessing. The public is for anyone who wants to penetrate it to undermine it. To dream that my husband is having sex with me from behind shows the sins he commits and the pain he suffers if he is pregnant and the disease that affects her fetus with her. However, if the intercourse is in front of the public, this is an indication of intense feelings between her and her husband. I dreamed That my husband had sex with me according to Ibn Sirin. A dream that my husband had sex with me according to Ibn Sirin expresses feelings of physical and emotional need for her husband, so she must tell him so that he can deal with the matter and restrain her, and if she seems happy, this is evidence of her happiness and psychological and social stability with him. title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing gold and money in a dream

preview.html: Seeing gold and money in a dream: The dreamer is exposed to many surprises and strange things in the world of dreams. He may see himself collecting a lot of money or gold, or find a large treasure in which there is gold and money, and he immediately imagines that the matter is big. It is better for him. What are the interpretations of seeing gold and money in a dream? We explain that to you. Seeing gold and money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing gold and money in a dream. Seeing gold and money in a dream is linked to a wealth of signs, and there is a big difference between them among interpretation scholars, because gold is one of the things whose meanings differ greatly. A team of dream jurists confirms that Gold is something that is disliked in a dream because of its yellow color, which indicates fatigue and illness, while another group of scholars decided that it is a sign of inheritance and increased strength. There are other matters that are highlighted by seeing money according to its type, due to the presence of paper and metal money, and some have indicated that paper money has Some small differences that are easy to overcome, but in general when given to the pioneer, peace and happiness appear, God willing. Although gold is one of the unwanted things in the dream world for some, gold coins are a source of multiplication of livelihood and high wealth And the great status that the dreamer acquires. While seeing coins indicates some burdens that the individual is dealing with alone and a dispute may arise with someone close to you if you see that you have a lot of coins, God forbid. Seeing gold and money in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explains that gold in The dream symbolizes the distress and difficulty of the situation, whether psychological or material, but there are some things that he said are good, such as a gold chain or necklace, but apart from that, there are many caveats. Which was mentioned about him in the interpretation of a dream about gold. One of the meanings of seeing banknotes according to Ibn Sirin is that it also emphasizes making money, and if someone finds a large and huge treasure, then he has supreme authority that he obtains from his work or a large inheritance from a family member. He focuses on another topic. It is the loss of money by the dreamer, which he does not consider good at all, as it turns out to be a bad omen and may indicate a lack of worship or the lack of exposure of one of the dreamer’s children to it. A serious problem or a serious accident. Ibn Sirin explains that coins are one of the symbols that depict the occurrence of conflicts between individuals and may indicate some academic problems for students. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search from Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by the most important jurists Interpretation.Seeing gold and money in a single woman’s dream. Dream experts have proven that seeing a golden girl with money is a good sign that she will reach the job she wants at work or she can engage in a specific project whose gains will be huge and distinguished, and which will cover all needs and will increase. Strong will. As for seeing only gold in a dream, this may clearly indicate marriage in the case of an engaged girl.

title: Interpretation of a dream about flipping Ibn Sirin’s hair

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss: One of the things that many people, especially women, know is that this dream is considered one of the unpleasant visions for a pioneer because no one wants to lose their hair, but the interpretation of a dream about hair depends on the psychological and social circumstances that the dreamer is experiencing, but most interpretation scholars have confirmed that this dream It symbolizes that the dreamer is exposed to a great loss of money, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss: Seeing someone losing hair in a dream symbolizes the worries and sorrows that dominate that person’s life. Seeing someone losing his hair in a dream means that he is a person with weak strength and will give up easily. If a person sees that his hair is falling out to the point that he has become bald, this means that he will ask for some money from his manager or boss, and his manager will not respond to his requests, and the person will feel remorse and humiliation. Interpretation of a dream about trimming Ibn Sirin’s hair: According to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, seeing hair falling out in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer from Significant loss, and the amount of loss depends on the amount of hair that falls out. If a person who has a lot of money sees in his dream that his hair is falling out, this means that he will make a new deal that will make him lose everything he has. Seeing a poor person losing his hair in a dream symbolizes improving his circumstances. Materialism and acquiring money. Whoever sees that the hair on the front of his head falls out in a dream indicates a quick response to his request, and vice versa, if the hair falls out from the back of his head, this indicates delay in all his requests. A person seeing that the hair on his head is falling out and falling into food is evidence of the narrowness of life and the lack of means of livelihood for him and his family members and that they are living in a state of hardship. Dream interpretation of hair that bothers one woman. Seeing an unmarried woman with her hair falling out in a dream symbolizes revealing something that she was hiding from everyone. Vision. An unmarried woman with her hair falling out in a dream indicates her separation from someone she loves. Seeing an unmarried woman losing her hair in a dream is evidence that she is doing something hateful and forbidden, and after a certain period of time has passed she regrets this action. Seeing an unmarried woman losing her hair as soon as she touches it in a dream It indicates that she is losing effort and effort without any benefit. Seeing an unmarried woman losing her hair as soon as she touches it in a dream means that she is doing a good job and providing services to people who do not appreciate it. What is the interpretation of seeing a lot of hair loss in a single woman’s dream? If she sees an unmarried woman For a married woman to see her hair falling out a lot in a dream, this is evidence that she will receive a lot of provision from God for her. Seeing an unmarried woman losing her hair to the point that she has become bald in a dream means that she is a girl distinguished by great intelligence, cunning, and wisdom as well. Seeing a single woman in a dream Her hair falls out a lot and she feels sad because of the hair loss, which is evidence of the emergence of many problems and misfortunes that are difficult to get rid of on her own. Interpretation of a dream about black hair falling out for unmarried women: Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing an unmarried woman with black hair falling out in a dream is evidence of her long life and good health. Seeing an unmarried woman with black hair

title: Delving into the interpretation of seeing magic in a dream for a married woman, seeing magic and the magician in a dream for a married woman, decoding magic in a dream for a married woman, and seeing a veil of magic in a dream for a married woman.

preview.html: It is a very disturbing vision to see magic in a dream for a married woman, especially if she feels that there is no love around her, and the interpretation of her dreams varies depending on the details that accompany them. You may see her mesmerized, or sitting with one of the magicians, or find her ability to decipher magic codes, and all of these details have different interpretations. Magic in a dream for a married woman. Magic in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman lives happily and contentedly with her husband and children, then seeing magic in a married woman’s dream indicates That there are difficulties that appear in her life and she cannot overcome them easily, but it requires a lot of fatigue and effort and that she deal with great wisdom to overcome them safely. If she sees a bewitched person and sees him stumbling here and there without realizing it, then she does not actually find happiness with her husband, but rather On the contrary, she finds that he suffers from neglect and indifference to her feelings and actions. He does it to win his heart. But if she sees herself under the influence of a certain spell, she may love money very much and prefer it to her happiness and stability. If she sees the magician writing charms on paper, this means that someone is trying to harm her and is waiting for her until the opportunity comes. It is one of the most disturbing visions for its owner. He was found practicing this sorcery, and because magic is known to be a form of disbelief, the person with insight may be on his way to atheism and turning away from his religion, God. In the event that she performed magic in her dream and intended to harm a specific person but was unable to do so, then she is trying to harm the same person in the future. In reality, but she is unable to do so. Interpretation of magic in a dream for a married woman and her husband is the one who bewitches her, and some scholars in dream interpretation have interpreted it as being under the influence of the husband, who can benefit from her if he is a man. Bad morals, and he can captivate her with his love and tenderness if he is a good man and attached to his home and children. Sorcery in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin. The fortune teller must be very careful of those around her, especially men, as not all of them have good intentions, but there may be those who try Looking at her with an immoral look and trying to create a big problem in her life with her husband. If she sees that she is bringing magic out of the ground and touching it with her hands, this means that she is far from the right path, her preoccupation with worldly pleasures, and her distance from the correct approach to religion. If a married woman does not actually pray or fast For example, this dream will serve as a severe warning to her of the need to return to her Lord, fear Him, and stay away from the path of Satan. You will find all the interpretations of Ibn Sirin’s dreams and visions on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. Seeing a sorcerer and a sorcerer in a dream for a married woman if she sees that she is sitting with Charming and she feels comfortable in this session, she is following the path of devils in reality, and there are many dark thoughts that control her thinking and make her love to harm others, and this could be a matter of taking revenge on them. Some interpreters said that the dream indicates the presence of many disorders that make their relationship With her husband, she always goes through difficult stages

title: Interpretation of a dream about a mother dying while she is alive by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream about a mother dying and crying over her while she is alive

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mother dying while she is alive. Interpreters believe that the dream carries many interpretations that differ depending on the details of the dream and the viewer’s feelings. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a mother die while she is alive for a single woman. Married and separated people, pregnant women, and men, according to Ibn Sirin and the leading scholars of interpretation. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a mother’s death while she is alive. Interpretation of a dream about a mother’s death while she is alive. Seeing a mother’s death while she is alive is evidence that the dreamer feels fear for his mother, loves her, and seeks to please her. It is said that the mother’s death in a dream It symbolizes that the dreamer is a dependent person who does not bear responsibility and relies on his mother for everything, but in the event that the mother becomes ill in reality and the visionary sees her dying in the dream, this may indicate the approach of her death or her serious illness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees his mother dying in The dream, even though she is alive and well in reality, and do not cry for her or feel sorry during the dream, this indicates the abundance of goodness that awaits him in the coming days. He has good news that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will bless him in his life and grant him success in his work, even if the dreamer is sick. He dreamed that his mother died while she was alive, so it would be good news for him. That his recovery is near and free of pain. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother while she is alive. Ibn Sirin believes that the death of a mother while she is alive in a dream is a good thing if the dreamer is going through difficulties in his life, as the dream indicates relief from his distress and the removal of problems and worries from him. His shoulders. And if the dreamer sees his mother dying in a dream while she is alive in reality, this indicates major changes in his life soon. If the dreamer carries his mother’s shroud in the dream, this indicates his good morals and good behavior among people, but if the dreamer sees himself burying his mother in the vision While she is alive, he travels. The country will soon work or study, and if the dreamer is crying over the death of his mother, the dream symbolizes feelings of anxiety about something or someone, and perhaps the dream is a warning to him to abandon his fears of harm and no benefit to him. Egyptian website, the largest website specialized in interpreting dreams in the homeland. Al-Arabi Just type the Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a mother while she is alive for a single woman. Interpretation scholars believe that seeing the death of a mother while she is alive for an unmarried woman portends bad luck, as it indicates that she will be in great trouble and will not be able to Escape from it, as there are some obstacles in it. In her own way. Life that prevents her from achieving her goals, but if the visionary cries over the death of her mother in the dream, this means that this is to alleviate her distress, get her out of crises and enable her to overcome any obstacle she faces. In her own way. In the event that the dreamer sees his mother dying and coming back to life, the dream foretells that her marriage will soon be with a wealthy man who works in a prominent position and occupies a high position in society. If the mother dies suddenly and unexpectedly, the vision
